result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam E Kittel

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Case called: 10:39 am
Includes 15CF130, 15CF153, 15CF165, 15CM369.
Clerk: Kassidi
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Julie Sawyer;

PRELIMINARY HEARING in 15CF130, 15CF153, 15CF165:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.
Plea: NOT GUILTY

PLEA/SENTENCING ON all cases:
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves:
15CF130:
Ct. 2 (Possession of THC)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Carry Concealed Weapon)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>DRI.

15CF153:
Ct. 2 (Forgery-Uttering)>>DRI.

15CF165:
Ct. 2 (Misappropriate ID Info-Obtain Money)>>DRI
Ct. 3 (Misappropriate ID Info-Obtain Money)>>DRI
Ct. 4 (Theft-Movable Property)>>DRI.
Ct. 6 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>DRI

15CM369:
Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property)>>DRI
Ct. 2 (Theft-Movable Property)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.
  
PLEA: 
15CF130:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>>NO CONTEST

15CF153: 
Ct. 1 (Forgery-Uttering)>>NO CONTEST

15CF165:
Ct. 1 (Misappropriate ID Info-Obtain Money)>>NO CONTEST
Ct. 5 (BJ-Felony)>>NO CONTEST

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/H- 4 years probation on each count, concurrent. CONDITIONS: 44 days time served MCJ, I/S 120 days MCJ on Ct. 1 in 15CF130, Absolute Sobriety from drugs, AODA and follow up, counseling as recommended, Full time work/Full time schooling and when not fully engaged, must complete 15 hours Community Service a week, Restitution of $200 to B.K., $151.50 to Pawn America, $202.50 to Downtown Pawn and to be paid back at the rate of $15/month when on probation. Court Costs. COURT finds 44 days jail credit. 2 DNA Surcharges-Remits Surcharge on 15CF153.

Adjourned: 10:59 am

INCLUDES 15CM369, 15CF165, & 15CF153 Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 for Day report-drugs.   No contact with victim(s): B.K., R.K., Pawn America, Downtown Pawn, Dunkin Donuts-RIb Mt., & McDonalds-Schofield. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
